response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are currently offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a significant discount compared to market value. We believe in making high-quality products accessible to those who appreciate their true worth. Let's bring this masterpiece into your life today.", "product_price": 15000}
